definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: I was a chain-smoker and smoked two packs of cigarettes a day.
sentences.chinese: 我是個老煙鬼，每天要吸兩包煙。

sentences.english: Herry is a chain smoker, consuming at least five packs a day.
sentences.chinese: 亨利是個老煙鬼，至少一天抽五包煙。

sentences.english: It's beyond me why she married such a heavy smoker.
sentences.chinese: 我實在無法理解爲什麼會她嫁給這樣一個煙鬼。

sentences.english: Tom is a chain smoker, consuming at least five packs a day.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是個大煙鬼，每天要抽5包的煙。

sentences.english: I don't wanna be a chimney.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想稱爲一個煙鬼。

sentences.english: My brother was a chain-smoker and smoked two packs of cigarettes a day.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥是一個老煙鬼，每天要吸兩包煙。

sentences.english: I hate chimneys smoking next to me.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭煙鬼在我旁邊抽菸。

sentences.english: I have become a chimney since I lost my job.
sentences.chinese: 自從失業了以後，我就成了一個煙鬼。

sentences.english: Above all, I was a chain smoker for years.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是，我是一個多年連續抽菸的煙鬼。

sentences.english: He is a chimney, so his mother always chews his ears off.
sentences.chinese: 他是個煙鬼，爲此他媽媽沒少在他耳邊嘮叨。

sentences.english: The magistrate was an opium smoker and let Li do all the work.
sentences.chinese: 縣長是個大煙鬼，什麼事都讓李去幹。

sentences.english: Tony has become a chimney since his G. F dumped him.
sentences.chinese: 託尼自從被女友甩了後，變成了一個大煙鬼。

sentences.english: He is always smoking, because he is a chimney.
sentences.chinese: 他總是在抽菸，因爲他就是個煙鬼。
